llm_recommendations.reason_for_recommendation: Chairman's strategic outlook on AI's impact on job market and new opportunities, positioning Infosys in the AI transformation at its AI Investor Day 2026.
Pioneering fully automated factory for semiconductor chip assembly, enhancing competitiveness and addressing skilled labour shortages.
Chairman Mukesh Ambani announced a commitment of ₹10 trillion investment over seven years into AI-related infrastructure through Reliance and Jio.
OpenAI partnering with Tata Group for an AI push into India, including embedding Agentic AI tools for clients handled by Tata Consultancy Services.
Using Nvidia’s enterprise software platforms to onboard new software management capabilities for clients.

Adani Group’s $100-billion investment commitment for an AI-ready data centre and power ecosystem.
Founder's positive outlook on AI's impact on productivity and jobs, relevant for a company whose business (Naukri.com) is tied to the job market.
Former CEO's perspective on automation and job market transformation due to AI, indicating an important industry trend for major IT players.
